data: You're walking down a dark alley. You don't remember who you are, where you're from, or how you got here.
You wonder why nobody else is here. It's eerily quiet.
You feel hungry. There are some trash cans. There is also a cat moving stealthily out of the alley.

choices.msg: Scrounge the trash cans for food
data: You rummaged the trash for eatables.
After a few minutes, you found a half-empty potato chip packet.
Not the best meal, but you'll take it.
You think about your next course of action.

choices.msg: Hide in a trash can until morning
data: Not the most comfortable bed in the world, but it works.
You tuck yourself in.
-- morning --
It's morning now. You shake off the rotten tomatoes.
What will you do?

choices.msg: Climb the walls of the alley
data: ...suddenly, you're bitten by a spider.
You find that you can do amazing things..
..like climbing up walls for example!
You trek to the terrace of a building.
Suddenly, you feel weaker.
THE SPIDER has forsaken you!
You're stranded! What do you do now?

choices.msg: Try to get bitten by a bat
data: You try to imitate the high-pitched shrieks of bat's prey.
You succeed! A bat has appeared from nowhere and is now gliding towards your calls.
You forgot that bats can live in colonies of more than a million.
Approximately a hundred are now speeding their way towards you.
You scream in hopes of scaring the bats away from you.
It didn't work. Bats are attracted to higher-pitched sounds.
Approximately five hundred are now wending there way towards you.
There is no space on this terrace.
You got bitten.
Lying down, in ache of these wounds, you feel a fun sensation.
Despite yourself, you jump off the roof.
The next thing you remember, your face is towards a brown ceiling.
This is definitely a house.
You stumble off the hammock you've been sleeping on and you notice the bandages.
Someone has been tending to you.
You try running through the house, desperately searching for an exit.
You find a medium sized window to jump out of.
Take the jump?
You jump.
Regrettably, this is a two story house.
You manage not to black out.
You scan your surroundings.
Trees, pink sky, and a road.
Is this a coastal region?
If so, there is hope you can find a settlement, a job, and thereby a house.
(On further thought you realize that those could have been offered by the house you just exited.)
Ah well. No turning back now.
You ran towards the trees, what were you thinking!?

choices.msg: Wait at the front door shamefaced

data: Assuming the pose of The Thinker, you sit on a trashcan lid.
What brought you to this point? Were the decisions you made rational?
Were the choices you made stupid? How did you get here?
You dwell on your earlier eagerness to rummage a trash can.
Did it come to this? Have you no dignity?
-- morning --
Pondering these no doubt soul-searching questions you forget it's morning.
You swear you will uphold your honor no matter what.
There are now a limited set of options for you.
You follow the cat, through rain, storm, and GLOM OF NIT, until you drop of exhaustion.
You wake up.
-- morning --
It's morning, and the cat has decided to feed you...a fish?
You ate the fish. You are now bonded with the cat.
You now posess catlike agility, hearing, and curiosity.
Catman, what do you do?
You walk out of the alley, determined to find civilization.
The roads, though gratefully blood-free, are deserted.
You can't see a car for miles.
The buildings look like they've been burnt down.
Where do you go?
